What Our Travelers Are Saying

Flooded Fast!

⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
"The water was a little higher than advertised, but hey, free snorkeling with every meal! Five stars for the surprise cardio workout trying to escape the tide!"

- Trevor B.

Frozen Finances

⭐⭐⭐
"Booked the 'Frozen Fantasies' package to Glacier National Park. By the time we arrived, the only thing frozen was my credit card balance. Gorgeous puddles though."

- Mia T.

Authentic Bulldozer Tour

⭐⭐
"Last Chance Getaways promised 'exclusive views of the vanishing Amazon rainforest.' They delivered: we got to see two trees and a bulldozer. Authentic!"

- Damien L.

Flash Flood Fun

⭐⭐⭐⭐
"I’ve never felt more alive than running from a flash flood in Venice! Five stars for adrenaline. Minus one star because my Gucci loafers didn’t survive."

- Cassidy R.

Penguin Hide and Seek

⭐⭐⭐
"We loved the Antarctic Peninsula package! The penguins were charming, if you could spot them through the thick wall of microplastics. Thanks for the memories (and the rash)!"

- Jordan M.

Guilt in Gold

⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
"A luxurious escape to a dying world. Every sunset over the bleached coral whispered 'this is your fault' in the most elegant way imaginable."

- Sierra K.

Grieving the Reef

⭐⭐
"Honestly disappointed. I booked the ‘Great Barrier Brief’ expecting colorful reefs. Instead, it was more of a Great Barrier Grief. Should’ve read the fine print."

- Matt V.

Existential Aperol

⭐⭐⭐⭐
"Absolutely stunning landscapes, if you enjoy existential dread with your aperol spritz. Bonus points for the 'Postcards from a Dead Future' souvenir package."

- Priya S.

Immersive Panic

⭐⭐⭐⭐
"Our 'Last Chance Adventure' felt very real: the hotel was underwater by day three. Bold move by the company to call it 'immersive luxury.' Would panic again!"

- Elena D.

Bugs, Burns, and Regret

⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
"Signed up for the Amazon Basin tour and got complimentary mosquito bites, heatstroke, and mild deforestation guilt. 10/10, would recommend for masochists."

- Chris J.

Venetian Dolphin Encounter

⭐⭐⭐⭐
"Booked the 'Venice Atlantis Experience.' Was not informed it would include sharing my gondola with a dolphin. Five stars for the aquatic ambiance. Zero stars for personal space."

- Olivia S.

Ghost Coral Whispers

⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
"Great Barrier Reef package promised 'vibrant marine life.' Mostly saw the ghost of a coral whisper 'leave.' Tour guide said it was part of the package. Unforgettable."

- Zane W.

Champagne and Crying

⭐⭐⭐⭐
"Nothing says luxury like sipping champagne while watching the last glacier weep into the sea. Would have cried too, but hydration costs extra."

- Harper D.

Influencers in the Wildfire

⭐⭐⭐
"We did the Amazon Basin 'Into the Ashes' tour. Saw six fires, two bulldozers, and one influencer doing a TikTok dance in front of a dying tree. The true circle of life."

- Kellan J.

Plastic Gyre Adventure

⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
"The 'Antarctic Twilight' package was breathtaking. Especially when our eco-cruise ship got stuck in a plastic gyre and we had to eat the captain's hat for survival. Five stars for drama!"

- Lacey P.

Apocalypse Pool Parties

⭐⭐⭐⭐
"Loved our 'Climate Collapse Luxe' itinerary: snorkeling above submerged city ruins by day, attending themed apocalypse cocktail parties by night. Honestly felt like I was the problem."

- Marcus F.

Honeymoon Hydration Crisis

⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
"Perfect honeymoon! Nothing bonds two people like arguing over who forgot the emergency desalination tablets when the taps ran dry mid-vacation. Memories are priceless."

- Jamie & Taylor

Meltdown Safari

⭐⭐⭐⭐
"The personalized 'End of Days Safari' in Glacier National Park exceeded expectations. Saw two melting icebergs, one deranged elk, and at least three existential crises. Bravo."

- Devon S.

Banana Boat Mayhem

⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
"They promised a 'front-row seat to history' at Venice. They did not mention the 'row' would be on an inflatable banana boat being chased by jellyfish. A+ for spontaneity!"

- Rachel V.

Carbon Offsets and Lies

⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
"Signed up for the Last Chance Getaways Loyalty Program. Earn one free night for every carbon offset lie you tell yourself. I’m Platinum now."

- Owen M.
